TEXT.TITLE: BSD MEDICAL <BSDM.O> SELLS SECURITIES PRIVATELY
TEXT.BODY: BSD Medical Corp said it has received 1,400,000 dlrs of equity capital from the private sale of securities to two investment partnerships and director Alan L. Himber. Reuter
